headline: Boston Scientific expands infusion offerings with Intera Oncology acquisition
summary: Intera’s portfolio consists of Intera 3000 Hepatic Artery Infusion Pump, which is used to administer chemotherapy in liver cancer patients.

raw.headline: Boston Scientific expands infusion offerings with Intera Oncology acquisition

headline: Boston Scientific Announces Agreement to Acquire Intera Oncology® Inc.
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) today announced it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Intera Oncology® Inc., a privately held medical device company that provides the Intera 3000 Hepatic Artery Infusion Pump and floxuridine – a chemotherapy drug – both of which are approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. The Intera 3000 pump is used to administer hepatic artery infusion (HAI) therapy to treat tumors in the liver primarily caused by metastatic colorectal cance

raw.summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) today announced it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Intera Oncology® Inc., a privately held medical device company that provides the Intera 3000 Hepatic Artery Infusion Pump and floxuridine – a chemotherapy drug – both of which are approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. The Intera 3000 pump is used to administer hepatic artery infusion (HAI) therapy to treat tumors in the liver primarily caused by metastatic colorectal cance

headline: Boston Scientific to buy Intera Oncology, maker of liver cancer treatment
summary: Intera makes a pump and a chemotherapy drug to treat liver tumors. Boston Scientific sees the purchase as a way to provide more comprehensive cancer treatments.

raw.headline: Boston Scientific to buy Intera Oncology, maker of liver cancer treatment
